title: Sleeper Picks + Hype Trains, Sony & Etienne News - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/25
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, get Sleeper picks for the 2021 season! Andy, Mike, and Jason each name two players to target late in fantasy football drafts! Plus, the latest NFL news and a new edition of Buy or Sell. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 25th, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (5:00) Buy or Sell
 (9:50) NFL News & Notes
 (26:30) Sleepers
 (27:00) Jakobi Meyers
 (30:55) Russell Gage
 (33:45) Justin Fields
 (38:40) Bryan Edwards(44:00) Van Jefferson
 (45:40) Marquez Callaway
 (49:05) Tua Tagovailoa
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
  
 Manscaped -- Code: FOOTBALLERS20
 NFLSundayTicket.TV/SundayReady - Code: BALLERS2021FanDuel
 Sleeper
 Pristine Auction -- Registration Code - BALLERS
 Support this podcast 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
